\coqdockw{match} \coqdocvar{n} \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol

\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{O} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} 0\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}

\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{S} \coqdocvar{n} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{INP} \coqdocvar{n} + 1\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol

\coqdocnoindent
\coqdoctac{intros} \coqdocvar{p1} \coqdocvar{p2} ; \coqdoctac{split} ; \coqdoctac{intro} \coqdocvar{H}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{0.50em}

\coqdocindent{0.50em}
\coqdoctac{split}; \coqdoctac{rewrite} \coqdocvar{H}; \coqdoctac{reflexivity}.\coqdoceol
